page.title: 12Whalley Primary Sch.,Lancs.
page.content: In 1882 records show that the three departments of{Whalley National School taught 74 boys,193 girls & 86 infants. The{primary school}of 1985 has a total of{210}5-11 yr olds.These pupils are divided into{7 classes}by age, taught by{9 full-time}teachers and two ancilliary staff. School begins at 9-00a.m.,finishing at 3-25p.m.After a daily assembly classes are taught the basics of {reading,writing and arithmetic,}with a variety of other subjects such as art, music and environmental studies. {School uniform}a combination of blue and grey is optional.School dinner is served at 12-00 at a cost of{55p - a choice of two munus is offerd.Many children bring a packed lunch. The school's{Parent Teacher Assoc. } has provided much new equipment over the years including three{computers.
